JUVENILE + DOMESTIC VICTIMS (19 young children, ages 9-11, and 2 teachers killed, 11 other young children and 6 adults wounded, including the gunman's grandmother & 2 officers), gunman: Salvador Ramos, an 18-yr-old high school student  armed with an AR-15 with 7 high-capacity magazines and wearing a ballistic vest (killed by responding Border Patrol agent). The gunman exchanged gunfire with police who responded 4 minutes after he entered the building, wounding 2 officers. The gunman legally purchased two AR-15s on his 18th birthday and subsequently purchased at least 7 high-capacity magazines and hundreds of ammunition rounds.
